PUB RUN IS STILL ON EVEN WITH THE SNOW!

HERE ARE THE DETAILS!

So pub run is in 2 days and I wanted to give a quick update. There has been a slight change of plans and we will be starting and ending at Whiskey's (which is less than a block from Lir!). The event starts at 2:00 pm and goes until we're done!

I will have my phone on me, so please send me a text if you can't make it the first bar and I can give you our location and ETA at the next bar my cell is 603.560.3897. With that said, here is the list of bars in order:

FAQ:
How long is Pub Run?
It varies but we spend about 30 minutes at each bar and about 15 minutes to get everyone from one bar to the next!

How far is it between bars?
About .5 miles, the longest is about .75 miles between bars. I mapped the distance and it looks like it ends up being a little less than 3 miles total.

What should I bring?
Your ID, $$, T-pass, maybe a camera. I would recommend a small backpack or one of those cinch backpacks.

What should I wear?
Running gear, including running shoes. Dressing in layers is highly recommended. If you have them, bring reflective materials/ blinking lights as it will be dark for the last few runs.

What will happen if it rains?
We'll get wet when running (yes pub run is rain or shine!) Right now the weather looks ok, with maybe a couple snow showers.

Where should I park?
I wouldn't recommend driving at all, because I wouldn't recommend driving afterwards for safety reasons. There is also limited parking near Whiskey's.

What should I do to get ready for Pub Run?
Make sure to eat and hydrate well in the morning!

Will it be fun?
Well gosh, of course!

Is there food?
Well, as you know this is a free event, and there are no dues to be a member of the group, so there will not be free food. However, Whiskey's has 15 cent wings and last time we were there everyone pitched in and we got a couple plates full. If you need to stop along the way for food there are plenty of places in this little corridor of Boston!

Happy running and see you on Saturday!

Jen
